pages.text: Fertilizers are wonderful packages of Sawdust and other materials mixed together. When used, it will activate Bone Meal in a large radius.
Sludge is essential in the production of Fertilizer.$(p)Sludge is a result of failed recipes in a Fluid Bath, or by combining two organic items with Water in a Mixer.
Fertilizer will grow crops and grass in a 3x3 area!

Enhanced Fertilizer will grow crops and grass in a 5x5 area!$(p)To get this, you will need $(item)Crimson Sawdust,$() gotten as a byproduct from milling Crimson Hyphae in a Lumber Mill.$(p)Combine this and a Fertilizer in a Mixer with lava to get Enhanced Fertilizer.

Ultimate Fertilizer will grow crops and grass in a 7x7 area!$(p)To get this, you will need $(item)Warped Sawdust,$() gotten as a byproduct from milling Warped Stem in a Lumber Mill.$(br)Combine this and a Enhanced Fertilizer in a Mixer with Condensed Void to get Ultimate Fertilizer.

Chaotic Fertilizer will grow crops and grass in a 10x10 area!$(p)To get this, you will need $(l:age5#chaosbarklog)Chaosbark Sawdust$(/l), a byproduct from milling Chaosbark Log in a Lumber Mill.$(br)Combine this and an Ultimate Fertilizer in a Mixer with Dark Energy to get Chaotic Fertilizer.
